Interface WebViewerCapabilities

The capabilities of a WebViewer.

  • Located at WebViewer.capabilities
  • Determined by the Renderer implementation, GPU, browser, O/S and other system resources

Hierarchy

  • WebViewerCapabilities

Index

Properties

  • astcSupported
  • bptcSupported
  • dxtSupported
  • etc1Supported
  • etc2Supported
  • maxViews
  • pvrtcSupported

Properties

astcSupported

astcSupported: boolean
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/WebViewerCapabilities.ts:22

Flag set true if SceneModel.createTexture supports ASTC texture compression.

This capability would be supported by SceneModel.createTexture, and is determined by the Renderer implementation the WebViewer is configured with.

bptcSupported

bptcSupported: boolean
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/WebViewerCapabilities.ts:61

Flag set true if the WebViewer supports BPTC texture format(s).

This capability would be supported by SceneModel.createTexture, and is determined by the Renderer implementation the WebViewer is configured with.

dxtSupported

dxtSupported: boolean
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/WebViewerCapabilities.ts:53

Flag set true if the WebViewer supports DXT texture compression.

This will be determined by the Renderer implementation the WebViewer is configured with.

etc1Supported

etc1Supported: boolean
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/WebViewerCapabilities.ts:30

Flag set true if the WebViewer supports ETC1 texture compression.

This capability would be supported by SceneModel.createTexture, and is determined by the Renderer implementation the WebViewer is configured with.

etc2Supported

etc2Supported: boolean
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/WebViewerCapabilities.ts:46

Flag set true if the WebViewer supports ETC2 texture compression.

This capability would be supported by SceneModel.createTexture, and is determined by the Renderer implementation the WebViewer is configured with.

maxViews

maxViews: number
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/WebViewerCapabilities.ts:14

The number of Views we are allowed to create with WebViewer.createView.

This will be determined by the Renderer implementation the WebViewer is configured with.

pvrtcSupported

pvrtcSupported: boolean
  • Defined in webviewer/src/viewer/WebViewerCapabilities.ts:38

Flag set true if the WebViewer supports PVRTC texture compression.

This capability would be supported by SceneModel.createTexture, and is determined by the Renderer implementation the WebViewer is configured with.
